sourcesContent:
<template>
        <base-material-card class="px-5 py-3">
          <template v-slot:heading>
            <v-tabs
              v-model="tabs"
              background-color="transparent"
              slider-color="white"
            >
              <v-tab class="mr-3">
                <v-icon class="mr-2">
                  mdi-bug
                </v-icon>
                News
              </v-tab>
              <v-tab class="mr-3">
                <v-icon class="mr-2">
                  mdi-code-tags
                </v-icon>
                Filings
              </v-tab>
            </v-tabs>
          </template>

          <v-tabs-items
            v-model="tabs"
            class="transparent"
          >
            <v-tab-item
              v-for="n in 2"
              :key="n"
            >
              <v-card-text>
                <template v-for="(task, i) in tasks[tabs]">
                  <v-row
                    :key="i"
                    align="center"
                  >
                    <v-col cols="9">
                      <div
                        class="font-weight-light"
                        v-text="task.text"
                      />
                    </v-col>
                  </v-row>
                </template>
              </v-card-text>
            </v-tab-item>
          </v-tabs-items>
        </base-material-card>
</template>

<script>
import Axios from 'axios'
export default {
    name:'NewsBar',
    data() {
        return{
            title_array: [],
            summary_array : []

        }
    },
    created(){
        Axios.get('https://rcsandbox.ca/info/news/')
        .then(function (Response){
            for( let i = 0; i < range(len(Response)); i++){
                title_array.append(Response[i].title)
                summary_array.append(Response[i].postmedia_alexa)
            }
        }
        )

    }

}
</script>

<style>

</style>
